main.name: Nam Pham
main.description: I am a Computer Science and Mathematics freshman. Welcome to my homepage!
main.bio: I'm a Computer Science and Mathematics freshman at UMass Amherst, currently interning at CodSoft, where I'm delving into the world of web development. Previously, I explored the realm of connected devices as an IoT intern at Ho Chi Minh University of Technology. Beyond coding, I find joy in playing chess, soccer, and badminton, always seeking new challenges and opportunities for growth.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me using this form and I'll get back to you ASAP.

resume.skillmessage: Some of my skills with a somewhat arbitrary graphic representation of my competence.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Mathematics
education.description: Studied Software Engineering, Algorithms, Data Structures, AI, Databases, and more. Double Major in Mathematics, with concentration in Statistics/Data Science.

education.school: Le Hong Phong High School for The Gifted
education.description: Graduated high school having focused on computer science and mathematics.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: As a Web Developer Intern, I spearheaded the development of e-commerce and project management solutions using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, optimizing code for improved performance and efficiency, resulting in significant load time reductions and enhanced team productivity.

work.company: Ho Chi Minh University of Technology
work.title: IoT Intern
work.description: As an IoT intern, I contributed to the development of basic IoT applications utilizing Python, engaged in practical experimentation with Arduino robotic arms for object manipulation, and played a role in creating a household lighting usage monitoring system.

projects.title: Band Site
projects.category: A web app to showcase concerts and sell tickets

projects.title: Dragon-Repeller RPG Game
projects.category: A simple RPG game where you must defeat the dragon that is terrorizing the town

projects.title: Employee Data Processing
projects.category: A Python program to designed to process, analyze, and visualize employee data

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
